CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1967, pg. 7 reads: " "Unto You A Saviour!" - "And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shall call his name JESUS for he shall save his people from their sins." The story, old and yet new, was re-echoed in the darkness as lights reflected in the faces of real live characters, as they re-enacted the manger scene on the lawn at Faith Lutheran Church on Sunday Tuesday Thursday evenings last week.  The role of Mary was portrayed by Sandra Mills, and Joseph, by Wendell Jackson.  The scenery, including the stable manager and the shepherd's lean-to, were built by members of the church, under the direction of the pastor-director, Rev. T. Glammeyer - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Wendell Jackson and Sandra Mills enacting Nativity scene in front of lean-to shelter at Faith Lutheran Church
